title.rendered: 17 Best Night Clubs Near me in  Gaya Bihar NCR

content.rendered:
Gaya Bihar has one of the best nightclub scenes hands down! Looking for a place to dance your night away to thumping tunes and an electric atmosphere? Gaya Bihar clubs have your back. With the latest tunes blasting away in the speakers and delicious drinks to accompany your dance moves, Gaya Bihar is home to some of the best nightclubs in India. Tired of the everyday, boring routine and looking to break free from this exhausting circle of the rat race? Letting loose with your friends and dancing to popular tunes while devouring delicious food and drinks is an experience in itself. Here are the best nightclubs in Gaya Bihar that you should consider going to:

List of 17 Best Nightclubs Near me in Gaya Bihar NCR

  1. Playboy Club
  2. Kitty Su
  3. Privee
  4. Toy Room
  5. My Bar Headquarters
  6. LIT Bar
  7. Keya
  8. House A
  9. The Electric Room
  10. Club BW
  11. Lithiyum
  12. RSVP
  13. The Hong Kong Club
  14. Hype
  15. Roxy Club
  16. Club London Gaya Bihar
  17. Summerhouse Café

1. Playboy Club


Playboy Club at the iconic 5-star property of the Samrat Hotel in Connaught place is where the party’s at! The club offers state-of-the-art light and sound systems that will definitely put you in the mood to dance your night away. Undoubtedly one of the most happening places to be in Gaya Bihar, this club is all about good times, positive vibes, and creating memories. Brighten up your nights with champagne towers, a vintage wine selection, live music, and a private dining space. The delicious gourmet menu will make your night out even better.

Address: Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001
Timings: 11am to 1am
Zomato Rating: 4
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

2. Kitty Su


Located in Barakhamba, Connaught place, Kitty Su is a must-visit place you really wish to explore what Gaya Bihar nightlife is all about. This multi-level, state-of-the-art club is all about thumping music, aesthetic innovation, and opulence. The sophisticated and bold interiors of the club will just make you want to dance to some of the most top-notch musical artists and performances the club hosts. A great place to crash for an all-night party or any of the personal events you wish to host yourself. The vibe here is super classy and exquisitely designed to match the vibrancy of the place.

Address: Lobby Level The Lalit Hotel, Barakhamba Rd, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001
Timings: 10pm to 1am
Zomato Rating: 4.1
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

3. Privee


Privee is one of the finest clubs of Gaya Bihar which is located in the iconic Shangri-La Eros hotel on Ashoka road. Privee is a fun experience if you wish to check out what happens in Gaya Bihar after the sun goes down. The massive dance floor invites as many party goers as possible and a separate VIP area truly makes this club one of a kind and an experience to remember. The concept of this nightclub is to give an international experience of clubbing through their immaculate LED displays and clear thumping music. Normally A-listers can be seen attending these parties and thumping to the tunes of some of the most well-renowned artists.

Address: Shangri-La’s Eros Hotel, Ashoka Rd, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001
Timings: 10pm to 4am
Zomato Rating: 4.1
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

4. Toy Room


Toy room club has to be one of the most eccentric and truly a club that Gaya Bihar has never seen before. In short, it can be described as an amalgamation of arts, fashion, hip hop, and R&B DJ nights coming together to offer an electrifying time for the party-goers in Gaya Bihar. This is one club that takes letting your hair down a little too seriously and the interior decor will remind you of being in an adult playroom. This all-nighter club is located in Aerocity and this international nightclub is headed by its crazy, party-loving mascot, Frank! Dance your troubles away and keep coming back to the toy room for more exciting and fun times like never before.

Address: Aloft Hotel, Aerocity, Gaya Bihar 110037
Timings: 10:30pm to 4am
Zomato Rating: 2.2
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

5. My Bar Headquarters


My bar has been around in Gaya Bihar for decades now. With numerous bars popping up everywhere and famous for offering drinks at super cheap prices, it quickly became a much-loved place to hang for the youth of Gaya Bihar. My bar headquarters in Connaught places is the leveled-up version of a regular my bar outlet. Complete with a fun and spacious dining area accompanied with live DJ playing pumping tunes and a smoking room just inside the establishment is what makes this place extra special. A great place for people to throw their birthday parties and just let loose on weekends to delicious food and foot-tapping music.

Address: N 49, 2nd Floor, Radial Road Number 1, near Dominos, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001
Timings: 12pm to 10pm
Zomato Rating: 3.8
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

6. LIT Bar


Located in GK3, the LIT bar is a chic, elegant, and very classy space where you can hang out till the wee hours of the day. They are one of those rare places in Gaya Bihar that host football match viewing parties over drinks and delicious bar food. The place is well lit and staying true to its name and reputation, has a large wall of alcohol on display that will immediately put you in the mood to have a couple of drinks and dance your night out. The dim-lit space also creates a perfectly comfortable environment to forget about your worries and have a good time.

Address: VIPPS Centre HFCL, North Wing 2 LSC, GK 2 Main Rd, Masjid Moth, Greater Kailash, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110048
Timings: 12pm to 12:30am
Zomato Rating: 0
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

7. Keya


Located on the ground floor of the posh DLF promenade mall in Vasant Kunj, Keya is all about good food, great drinks, and memorable times. Although a little bit more on the expensive end, Keya offers a delicious platter of eclectic food like finger food, Asian and Italian cuisines with the white sauce chicken pasta being a crowd favorite. When it comes to beverages, Keya lives up to its expectations. This place hosts several match screenings and a thumping live DJ that will make it difficult for you to sit down.

Address: Vasant Kunj, New Gaya Bihar
Timings: 1pm to 10pm
Zomato Rating: 0
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

8. House A


House A in Hyatt Regency, Bhikaji Cama Place has quickly risen to fame for being one of the best nightclubs in Gaya Bihar. The interiors are Legeant, classy, and yet seem very happening. Their efficient and expertly skilled waiters and help make this place all the more worth it since the place is only as good as the customer service they have to offer. The menu is very elaborate and goes across a variety of cuisines so you can have a bunch of things to choose from. The thoughtfully planned and well-executed drinks menu is a treat in itself. If you are going on a pub crawl then this place has to be a must-visit.

Address: Bhikaji Cama Place, New Gaya Bihar
Timings: 1pm to 10pm
Zomato Rating: 0
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

9. The Electric Room


Nightlife in Gaya Bihar is all about delicious drinks, an eclectic environment, and thumping live music. The electric room is all that and more! Staying true to its name, the electric room located in The Lodhi creates an exciting environment through their live band and DJ performances which will just wash away your weekday blues. If you love music or dancing or just chilling, then this place should be on top of your list. Along with delectable continental, Mughlai, and north Indian food collection, it also has a fully stocked bar where the booze flows freely till 4 am in morning.

Address: The Lodhi Hotel, Lodhi Road, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110003
Timings: 1pm to 10pm
Zomato Rating: 2.6
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

10. Club BW


Club BW has always been every party goer’s top choice hands down! Located in New friend’s colony, this plush nightclub is everything that a thumping and happening club is supposed to be like. The staff makes sure that the club functions smoothly without any hassle and the awesome music selection here will definitely keep your foot tapping and head bobbing. The perfect place for a night out with your gang of friends as the party goes on till 3 am in the morning. Recently renovated you can also head to club BW if it has good food and drinks options you are looking for.

Address: Ground Floor, Suryaa Hotel, Maulana Mohammad Ali Jauhar Marg, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110065
Timings: 9pm to 4am
Zomato Rating: 3.8
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

11. Lithiyum


Located in the Ashok, diplomatic enclave in Chanakyapuri, Lithiyum is a fun place to hang out with your friends and especially celebrate some occasion or the other. This has to be one of the rare places which not only focuses on the interiors to create an aura but they offer an absolutely delectable platter of continental and Asian cuisines. If you are confused about where to spend your night dancing away then head onto lithiyum without a question. The place is all about loud music, vibrant ambiance, and a delectable spread that would make it hard for you to head back home.

Address: The Ashok B-50, Diplomatic Enclave, Chanakyapuri, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110021
Timings: 10pm to 4am
Zomato Rating: 3.7
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

12. RSVP


RSVP has to be one of the most happening clubbing scenes in Gaya Bihar. Famous for catering to numerous A-list stars and party-goers, RSVP is located in the royal plaza hotel on Ashoka road. If it is a chill hang-out session with your friends and family that you are looking for, then RSVP is just the place for you. The club is designed in such a way that you achieve some level of comfort while lounging here and having the delicious drinks and food menu. This Gaya Bihar club remains jam-packed with celebs and Gaya Biharites looking for a good time. You can look up the next happening event in the club for a more memorable time.

Address: The Royal Plaza Hotel, 19, Ashok Road, Janpath, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001
Timings: 10pm to 1am
Zomato Rating: 3.7
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

13. The Hong Kong Club


Located in the iconic hotel the Andaz in Aerocity, the Hong Kong Club is known for being a happening place with live music and excellent Cantonese food. If not for the nightlife, make sure to visit this club for its immaculate and authentic Cantonese food selection. With courteous staff and a modern setting complete with incredibly posh and plush interiors, the Hong Kong Club is all about celebrating good times and not forgetting about the importance of good food and a pleasant atmosphere. Needless to say, the Peking duck and Dimsums is a must-try.

Address: Andaz Gaya Bihar, The Hong Kong Club, Asset No. 1, Northern Access Rd, Aerocity, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110037
Timings: 6pm to 12am
Zomato Rating: 4.4
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

14. Hype


The hype has maintained its position for being one of the most awesome places to hang out at night. From hosting numerous sunburn pre-party events to performances by well-known DJs in the world, Hype has managed to maintain a steady pace in the race. Events and parties in Hype are super electric and thumping and when it comes to food and drinks, they are equally fascinating. The place boasts of being one of the best places in Gaya Bihar to have a dance party. The interiors are well done; the staff is helpful and courteous while the food is absolutely divine. Make sure to order dishes like teriyaki chicken skewers, mozzarella spring roll and wash it down with Dublin Damus which is a unique whiskey-based cocktail creation.

Address: Hotel The Royal Plaza, 19, Ashoka Rd, Janpath, Connaught Place, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110001
Timings: 8pm to 1am
Zomato Rating: 0
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

15. Roxy Club

If you are looking for a place to host a large get-together or a birthday party where you plan on inviting many people, the Roxy place is just the place for you to be. Located close to the famous Mangalam paradise mall in Rohini, Roxy club is all about hosting large personal events like anniversaries, birthdays, or even something else. Along with the large space you will also be treated with an elaborate menu of multi-cuisine dishes covering both vegetarian and non-vegetarian cuisines. The awesome drinks menu makes it the perfect choice for hosting cocktail parties while the cozy environment will make you feel right at home.

Address: Rohini, New Gaya Bihar
Timings: 8pm to 1am
Zomato Rating: 2.7
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

16. Club London Gaya Bihar


Club London is one of the most loved clubs among college students and the youth population of Gaya Bihar. Located in the ground southern park mall, club London is a great place to hang out with your friends, dance along to the hit tunes on the amazing music system, and gorge on delicious food. This club is one of those places where even if you don’t want to order food and simply dance your night away without anyone else judging you. Do not expect the club to be 5 stars worthy, rather it is a budget-friendly cool hangout place for the Gaya Bihar youth.

Address: Saket, New Gaya Bihar
Timings: 8pm to 1am
Zomato Rating: 0
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

17. Summerhouse Café


Summerhouse cafe shot to popularity when Coldplay’s lead singer Chris Martin had a surprise concert there. Ever since then the popularity of this cafe with a dance floor has managed to grow. Located in Hauz Khas and rather smaller in size when compared to other clubs of Gaya Bihar, Summerhouse will not fail to impress. Famous for its Italian, Chinese, and fast food collection, Summerhouse still hosts some of the most banging parties in town featuring top-tier DJ performances. The cafe is quiet and peaceful in the morning and afternoon time while as the sun goes down, it turns into a thumping clubbing scene. A must-visit for people looking to have a fun night out with their buddies.

Address: 1st Aurobindo Place Market, Sri Aurobindo Marg, Hauz Khas, New Gaya Bihar, Gaya Bihar 110016
Timings: 12pm to 1am
Zomato Rating: 4.0
Zomato Reviews: Click Here

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Q. Which is the most elite club in Gaya Bihar?

A. There are many clubs in Gaya Bihar that require special contacts and invites to get in. Some offer the service of membership to properly enjoy the elite club life in Gaya Bihar. For example the house A club in Gaya Bihar can only be entered if you have your name on the lust which makes it restricted for the upper-class crowd.

Q. What is the cut-off age for entry into any Gaya Bihar club?

A. The legal drinking age in Gaya Bihar is 25 years old and in some club entries, you may be asked to show proof of entry.

Q. Which are some other clubs in Gaya Bihar that will surely be a fun experience?

A. Other than the nightclubs mentioned in the list you can also check out places like passcode only and social offline.

Q. What happens at a nightclub?

A. Generally, people go to nightclubs to socialize, meet strangers, dance, or even go there with friends for a fun dance night out. Some people also choose to drink and watch their favorite DJ performance.

Q. What is stag entry?

A. Stag entry is a word defined as attending a dance party without a female companion. Many clubs don’t allow stag entry.

Q. I am a guy. What should I wear while clubbing in Gaya Bihar?

A. Club dressing is easier for the guys. You can go the casual route by wearing a casual white shirt or a denim shirt. You can also choose between wearing trousers, jeans or chinos. Smart sneakers can be a great choice of footwear.

Q. What is the biggest nightclub in the world?

A. Privilege Ibiza or also known as the Ku club is the world’s largest nightclub and has its name in the Guinness book of world records for being a supper club with a capacity of 10,000 people.

Q. How expensive is clubbing in Gaya Bihar?

A. Being a national capital and a hub for one of the most happening nightlife in India, a clubbing experience may be more on the expensive side. It can range from anywhere between 10,000 to 4 lakh rupees.

Q. How can I get free entry at the Gaya Bihar club?

A. There are many clubs in Gaya Bihar that offer free entry like the blue bar, club BW, Keya, Bohca, and story club and lounge.

Q. What is the club cover charge?

A. A cover charge is a sum of money that you must pay in some restaurants and nightclubs in addition to the money you pay for food and drinks.

@graph.name: DevFarswan
@graph.description: Param Dass, works with Namaste India Trip. An avid travel enthusiast by nature, he brings his characteristic zeal and sincerity to all projects he involves himself in. His videography and photography reflect his urge to help fellow travelers who embrace the pleasures and perils of journeys just for the sense of adventure and newness they bring to our otherwise monotonous lives.
